Posts.Content: Jul 28, 2017 07:42AM Ssmith250 wrote: My report says: There is an ill-defined irregular hypoechoic mass versus dense tissue in the immediate subareolar 9 o'clock breast. Another probable cluster of cysts is seen in the left 12 o'clock subareolar breast. Contrast-enhanced MRI of the breast. If the breast MRI is unrevealing, ultrasound-guided core needle biopsy of the subareolar left 9 o'clock area is recommended. If the breast MRI reveals abnormal left breast or nipple enhancement, then MRI guided core needle biopsy should be considered.
